description: Display of double sided freestanding advertisement panel with LED digital display measuring 2.92m high and 1.34m wide.
decision_conditions: <p>The proposed advertisement by reason of its size, scale, and siting would reduce the extent of open footway width and would materially detract from the function of the public highway and the safety of highway users and as such is contrary to policies LP42 (Walking and Cycling) of the Hackney Local Plan (2020) and Transport for London's Pedestrian Comfort Guidance (2010) and Streetscape Guidance (2016).</p><div><br></div>

<p>The proposed advertisement would represent an incongruous visual intrusion to the street scene and contribute to an unsightly proliferation and clutter of signage and street furniture in the local area that would detract from the visual amenity of the street scene and harm the setting of the adjacent Underwood Street Conservation Area. As such, the proposal would be contrary to policies D4 (Delivering Good Design) and HC1 (Heritage conservation and growth)of the London Plan (2021) and policies LP1 (Design quality and local character), LP3 (Designated Heritage Assets) and LP7 (Advertisements) of Hackney's Local Development Plan (2020).</p><div><br></div>
